product.title: Dr. Seuss’s ABC | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Need a helping hand teaching your little ones their ABCs? Try Dr. Seuss’s ABC. With its whimsical prose and zany illustrations, Dr. Seuss’s ABC takes children on a fun-filled romp through the alphabet while teaching them letters and pronunciation along the way. Considering all the other Seuss titles your children are sure to love, who better to introduce them to their ABCs than Dr. Seuss?

Tie-in Activity: Focus on a few letters as you read, and encourage your baby to copy the sounds you make. Or see if your child can think of other things that start with a certain letter sound. (Made-up words are just fine!)
